name: Crooks Saga
body:
### Welcome.
This is a small game about talking to people and solving small puzzles.
![Alt text](http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Dw5w_qCxbzE/VMcQh0gpR9I/AAAAAAAAF6Y/bVm2canPhH0/s1600/FirstScreen2.PNG "Screenshot")

### Authors and Contributors
@mrhether

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Crooks Saga, contact me at https://twitter.com/Liftyd
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
